password_reset_email_sent: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
auth/email-already-in-use: Email already in use. Please try logging in.
quiz-disclaimer: We use AI (GPT-4) to mark your work. We do our best to ensure that the marking is correct, but mistakes will be made from time to time, especially on more complex questions.
delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this quiz? This action cannot be undone.
something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
no-quizzes: You currently have no quizzes. Why not create one?
no-quiz: That quiz does not exist. Please check your quiz link.
no-course: That course does not exist. Please check your course link.
quiz-fail: Could not load quiz. Please try again later.
course-fail: Could not load course. Please try again later.
no-courses: You currently have no courses. Why not create one?
no-answer: The answer field is blank. Please enter an answer.
marking-failed: Marking failed - please check your internet connection and try again.
not-verified: Your account has not been verified. Please check your email for a verification link.
auth/user-not-found: No user exists with that email address. Please check your email address and try again.
auth/wrong-password: Incorrect password. Please check your password and try again.
question: Question
find-video: Find me a Youtube video on this topic
similar-example: Show me a similar worked example
quizlist-fail: Could not load quiz list. Please try again later.
number-of-marks: Number of marks for the question
save-quiz-failed: Updating quiz failed. Please try again later.
enter-quiz-description-label: Please enter a description for your quiz. You can enter as much or as little detail as you need.
enter-quiz-description: Please enter a description for your quiz.
quiz-creation-failed: Quiz creation failed. Please try again later
enter-course-description-label: Please enter a description for your course. You can enter as much or as little detail as you need.
enter-course-description: Please enter a description for your course.
quiz-course-failed: Course creation failed. Please try again later

no-marks: There are no scores for this quiz

welcome-text: Welcome to Learn Anything. Create, take and customise auto-marked quizzes on any subject. We're currently in beta, so please bear with us as we iron out any bugs. If you have any feedback, please email us at info@learnanything.uk. To get started, choose one of the following options:
question-correct: Great work! You got this question correct.
username-description: Your username will be visible to your teacher if you complete a quiz they have shared with you.
quizcode-description: If you have been given a quiz code, enter it here to complete the quiz
username-update-fail: Could not update username. Please try again later.
share-quiz-instructions: To share the quiz, give the code above to your students. They can then enter the code on the home page to complete the quiz. The code has been copied to your clipboard.
quiz-code-copied: The code has been copied to your clipboard. Give it to your students to allow them to complete the quiz.
view-score-option: Do you want to view your score or continue with the quiz?
feedback-sent: Your feedback has been sent, thank you.
feedback-describe: Please enter a short description of your feedback
insight-describe: Please enter a short description of how you would like to query the quiz results
no-chat-while-generating: Please wait for quiz generation to complete before sending a message.
